  • Method Details

    • putItemList

      public void putItemList(ArrayList<Item> itemList, int column) throws NotEnoughSpacePutException, InvalidColumnPutException
      Puts items in the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      itemList - items to insert.
      column - int, column where to insert.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughSpacePutException - not enough space left in the column to insert.
      InvalidColumnPutException - if column index is out of bound.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if bookshelf is full.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if full.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints()
      Calculates player's bookshelf points.
      Returns:
      int, points calculated.

    • countNearbyItems

      public int countNearbyItems(int i, int j, int counter, ItemType type)
      Auxiliary method used in calculatePoints method to calculate points given by nearby elements
      Parameters:
      i - row index.
      j - column index.
      counter - parameter returned, points counter.
      type - item's type.
      Returns:
      int, points counted.

    • getLocal

      public Sendable getLocal()
      Method used to create a LocalBoofshelf. This object is used to minimize information sent on network.
      Returns:
      Sendable, returns a LocalBookshelf.
